.. _class_TabBar_property_clip_tabs:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **clip_tabs** = ``true`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_TabBar_property_clip_tabs>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_clip_tabs**\ (\ value\: :ref:`bool<class_bool>`\ )
- :ref:`bool<class_bool>` **get_clip_tabs**\ (\ )

å¦‚æœä¸º ``true``\ ï¼Œåˆ™ä¼šéšè—è¶…å‡ºè¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹å®½åº¦çš„é€‰é¡¹å¡ï¼Œæ”¹ä¸ºæ˜¾ç¤ºä¸¤ä¸ªå¯¼èˆªæŒ‰é’®ã€‚å¦åˆ™ï¼Œä¼šæ›´æ–°è¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æœ€å°å°ºå¯¸ï¼Œè®©æ‰€æœ‰é€‰é¡¹å¡å‡å¯è§ã€‚

.. _class_TabBar_property_current_tab:

.. rst-class:: classref-property

:ref:`int<class_int>` **current_tab** = ``-1`` :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_TabBar_property_current_tab>`

.. rst-class:: classref-property-setget

- |void| **set_current_tab**\ (\ value\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ )
- :ref:`int<class_int>` **get_current_tab**\ (\ )

å½“å‰é€‰ä¸­é€‰é¡¹å¡çš„ç´¢å¼•å·ã€‚\ ``-1`` è¡¨ç¤ºæ²¡æœ‰é€‰ä¸­ä»»ä½•é€‰é¡¹å¡ï¼Œåªæœ‰åœ¨ :ref:`deselect_enabled<class_TabBar_property_deselect_enabled>` ä¸º ``true`` æˆ–æ‰€æœ‰é€‰é¡¹å¡éƒ½å¤„äºéšè—æˆ–ç¦ç”¨çŠ¶æ€ä¸‹æ‰èƒ½å¤Ÿè®¾ç½®ã€‚

.. _class_TabBar_method_set_tab_language:
